name: Google LightBar
description: Revert the new dark Google top bar back to its original colours.
additional_info:
If you're from the UK, then you can just install the script, otherwise follow the instructions below.

Instructions:

1) Click "Install with Stylish".
2) Click "Switch to edit".
3) On the second line of code, change "www.google.co.uk" to your country's version.
4) Click "Save".

Bitcoin donations: 1EuePMaLfkn4Vz6SoAc6R5BjqnXy8bugLS
